Detailed Description

Exception class for Xsens public libraries. Inherits from std::exception.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

XsException::XsException ( XsResultValue  err,
XsString const &  description,
bool  prefix = true 
)
inline

Initializing constructor.

This constructor uses the value in err and the supplied description to create a full text for when the user requests what() or text()

Parameters
errThe error code that the exception should report
descriptionA description of the error. The constructor prefixes this with a textual description of the error code unless prefix is false.
prefixWhether to prefix the description with a textual description of the error code or not (default is yes)
XsException::XsException ( XsString const &  description)
inlineexplicit

Initializing constructor.

Parameters
descriptionA description of the error.
